name: metadoodle
tagline: Only global economic collapse can save us now
body:
### Welcome to metadoodle

This site is the successor to [livingcode](http://livingcode.org/) and will be my place to post experiments, art, rants, and whatever else can be converted to binary and plunked into a blog.

Ideally, there will be nothing here because I'll get off the damn computer and go outside.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
